title: Revert production deployment from Version 8 to Version 6

requirements.text: Rollback/revert the live (production) deployment from Draft Version 8 to Version 6 so that end users are served the Version 6 build.
acceptanceCriteria: Production no longer serves the Draft Version 8 build.
Production serves the same frontend and backend code/state behavior as Version 6.
A hard refresh in the browser loads the Version 6 experience (no cached Version 8 assets being referenced).
No new functional or UI changes are introduced beyond restoring Version 6.

constraints: Do not introduce any new functionality or UI changes; this request is strictly a rollback to Version 6.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Fixing the loading screen or onboarding issues in this same change (only revert to Version 6).
Any rebrand, UI polish, or feature additions beyond what exists in Version 6.
